thread.title: Excellent place you should know about 5 mins from Paris
thread.title_full: Excellent place you should know about 5 mins from Paris - Review of Boulogne Residence Hotel, Boulogne-Billancourt, France - TripAdvisor

author: valgin2150
title: Excellent place you should know about 5 mins from Paris
text:
An excellent value for the money, on the upside - very welcoming - had a room with kitchenette and bath and wifi! Breakfast was better than most with more than just a croissant and coffee. The front desk was very helpful, and the location cannot be beat - 5 mins to metro station, 5 mins to the pool ( with slide ), 10 mins to the shopping center. One thing, it doesn't look as nice on the outside with a sort of generic retro signage...but walk through the door and you are home away from home!
Room Tip: They have rooms with and without kitchenettes See more room tips
